meta.description: QuakeFall feature contract. Features start as 'failing' and flip to 'passing' only after full validation. Never remove or edit feature specs — only update status.

features.name: build-script
features.description: tools/build.sh: Single command compiles native server + client + QVMs, copies QVMs to demoq3, reports errors. Supports 'native', 'wasm', 'all' targets. Exit code 0 = success.
features.validation: Run tools/build.sh, verify exit code 0, verify binaries updated

features.name: server-management
features.description: tools/server.sh: start/stop/restart/status/log subcommands. Checks for duplicate processes before starting. Starts with correct flags (vm_game 0, demoq3, sv_pure 0). Sets rcon password for automation. Env vars QF_MAP and QF_RCON for overrides.
features.validation: tools/server.sh start → server running. status → shows PID. stop → server dead. log → shows recent output.

features.name: rcon-client
features.description: tools/rcon.py: Send rcon commands to running ioq3ded, print response to stdout. Usage: python3 tools/rcon.py 'status'. Default password 'dev', default localhost:27960.
features.validation: Start server with rcon enabled, run tools/rcon.py 'status', verify response printed

features.name: map-compile-script
features.description: tools/compile_map.sh: Compile and deploy .map file with single command. Runs BSP/VIS/LIGHT passes, copies BSP to both native and WASM build dirs. Usage: tools/compile_map.sh maps/qfcity1.map
features.validation: tools/compile_map.sh maps/qfcity1.map succeeds, BSP exists in both build dirs

features.name: titan-part-definitions
features.description: bg_titan_parts.h: Shared header defining titan part table. Part enum (TITAN_PART_TORSO, _COCKPIT, _ARM_L, _ARM_R, _LEG_L, _LEG_R, _VENT). Each part has: local offset (vec3), dimensions (mins/maxs), damage multiplier (float), debug color (RGBA). Shared between game and cgame.
features.validation: Header compiles clean in both game and cgame modules

features.name: titan-content-flag
features.description: CONTENTS_TITANPART content flag in surfaceflags.h (bit 0x0400). Added to MASK_SHOT so weapon traces detect titan parts. NOT added to MASK_PLAYERSOLID so player movement ignores them. Titan part entities use this flag as their r.contents.
features.validation: Flag defined, MASK_SHOT includes it, code compiles, player movement unaffected

features.name: titan-child-spawn
features.description: When player enters titan mode (/titan), spawn child hitbox entities (ET_GENERAL) for each part in the part table. Set r.contents=CONTENTS_TITANPART, r.ownerNum=parent, takedamage=qtrue. Store child entity pointers on parent gclient_t. Link all entities.
features.validation: Enter titan mode, /titan_parts shows all child entities spawned with correct part types

features.name: titan-child-despawn
features.description: When player exits titan mode, G_FreeEntity all child hitbox entities. Clear stored pointers on parent gclient_t. No entity leaks across multiple enter/exit cycles.
features.validation: Enter/exit titan mode 5 times, /titan_parts shows no orphaned children, entity count stable

features.name: titan-child-positioning
features.description: Every server frame in ClientThink or G_RunFrame, update each child entity's r.currentOrigin based on: parent origin + yaw-rotated local offset from part table. Set r.mins/r.maxs from part table. Call trap_LinkEntity. Children track parent smoothly.
features.validation: Enter titan mode, move and turn, /titan_parts shows children tracking parent. Offsets rotate with yaw.

features.name: titan-debug-rendering
features.description: cg_titanDebug cvar (default 0). Value 1: translucent colored boxes for each titan part entity using trap_R_AddPolyToScene + whiteShader. Value 2: wireframe edges only. Part colors from bg_titan_parts.h. Rendered in CG_AddPacketEntities for titan part entity types.
features.validation: Set cg_titanDebug 1 in native client, enter titan mode, see colored boxes. Screenshot in docs/screenshots/.

features.name: titan-debug-command
features.description: Server-side console command /titan_parts: prints all child entity state for the calling player. Output: part name, entity number, world position, mins/maxs, damage multiplier. Also works via rcon for headless debugging.
features.validation: Enter titan mode, /titan_parts prints structured output. Also: tools/rcon.py 'titan_parts' returns data.

features.name: titan-damage-routing
features.description: When a child hitbox entity receives damage (G_Damage callback), route damage to parent player entity. Apply the part's damage multiplier from the part table. Attacker gets kill credit. Child entity itself has no health pool — all damage flows to parent.
features.validation: Shoot titan's cockpit (2x), verify parent takes double damage. Shoot arm (0.5x), verify half. Kill from part hit credits attacker.

features.name: titan-damage-log
features.description: Server cvar titan_damage_log (default 0). When 1, every hit on a titan part prints: attacker name, part name, weapon, raw damage, multiplier, final damage applied. Readable via server log or rcon.
features.validation: Set titan_damage_log 1, shoot titan parts, see detailed per-hit log in server console/log

features.name: titan-entity-callin
features.description: Console command /calltitan: spawns a titan entity (ET_GENERAL with a visible model or debug box) that drops from sky to ground near the player. Lands after ~3 second delay. Becomes boardable once landed. One titan per player max.
features.validation: Use /calltitan, titan entity appears and descends to ground. Visual confirmation required.

features.name: titan-embark
features.description: Player approaches landed titan, uses /embark or +use key within range. Player enters titan mode with full hitbox children. Titan world entity is consumed (freed). Player inherits titan's position.
features.validation: Call titan, wait for landing, embark. Player gains titan mode + hitbox children. Debug rendering confirms.

features.name: titan-disembark
features.description: Player uses /disembark while in titan mode. Player ejected to side of titan as pilot with base health. Titan entity either despawns or remains as empty hull (design TBD). Child hitboxes despawned.
features.validation: Disembark from titan. Player returns to pilot size/speed/health. No child hitbox entities remain.

features.name: titan-destruction
features.description: When titan (parent player) health reaches 0 while in titan mode: force-eject pilot, destroy titan, pilot spawns with base pilot health. Kill credit to attacker. Titan cooldown timer starts.
features.validation: Kill a titan. Pilot ejected alive with base health. Attacker gets kill credit. Titan mode off.
